body:
Five Cython 0.29 tests fail on Python 3.10.0a2.

We patched Cython to workaround two Python 3.10 bugs: https://src.fedoraproject.org/rpms/Cython/pull-request/24
* commit 6ba0345d98ee9ed0fcdc662be4fc81a7754d5080
* https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/3876#issuecomment-734787805 (issue not really fixed, see my comment)

Test failures:

```
======================================================================
FAIL: anno_gen (pure_doctest__generators_py35)
Doctest: pure_doctest__generators_py35.anno_gen
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.10/doctest.py", line 2204, in runTest
    raise self.failureException(self.format_failure(new.getvalue()))
AssertionError: Failed doctest test for pure_doctest__generators_py35.anno_gen
  File "tests/run/generators_py35.py", line 26, in anno_gen

----------------------------------------------------------------------
File "/builddir/build/BUILD/cython-0.29.21/tests/run/generators_py35.py", line 32, in pure_doctest__generators_py35.anno_gen
Failed example:
    print(ret[0]); print(ret[1])
Expected:
    return
    float
Got:
    return
    'float'
----------------------------------------------------------------------
File "/builddir/build/BUILD/cython-0.29.21/tests/run/generators_py35.py", line 35, in pure_doctest__generators_py35.anno_gen
Failed example:
    print(arg[0]); print(arg[1])
Expected:
    x
    int
Got:
    x
    'int'
```

This one is likely because annotations became strings by default.

```
FAIL: test_empty_frozenset (set)
Doctest: set.test_empty_frozenset
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.10/doctest.py", line 2204, in runTest
    raise self.failureException(self.format_failure(new.getvalue()))
AssertionError: Failed doctest test for set.test_empty_frozenset
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/cython-0.29.21/TEST_TMP/1/run/c/set/set.cpython-310-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", line unknown line number, in test_empty_frozenset

----------------------------------------------------------------------
File "/builddir/build/BUILD/cython-0.29.21/TEST_TMP/1/run/c/set/set.cpython-310-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", line ?, in set.test_empty_frozenset
Failed example:
    s is frozenset()   # singleton!
Expected:
    True
Got:
    False


======================================================================
FAIL: test_singleton_empty_frozenset (set)
Doctest: set.test_singleton_empty_frozenset
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.10/doctest.py", line 2204, in runTest
    raise self.failureException(self.format_failure(new.getvalue()))
AssertionError: Failed doctest test for set.test_singleton_empty_frozenset
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/cython-0.29.21/TEST_TMP/1/run/c/set/set.cpython-310-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", line unknown line number, in test_singleton_empty_frozenset

----------------------------------------------------------------------
File "/builddir/build/BUILD/cython-0.29.21/TEST_TMP/1/run/c/set/set.cpython-310-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", line ?, in set.test_singleton_empty_frozenset
Failed example:
    test_singleton_empty_frozenset()  # from CPython's test_set.py
Expected:
    1
Got:
    11


======================================================================
FAIL: test_empty_frozenset (set)
Doctest: set.test_empty_frozenset
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.10/doctest.py", line 2204, in runTest
    raise self.failureException(self.format_failure(new.getvalue()))
AssertionError: Failed doctest test for set.test_empty_frozenset
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/cython-0.29.21/TEST_TMP/1/run/cpp/set/set.cpython-310-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", line unknown line number, in test_empty_frozenset

----------------------------------------------------------------------
File "/builddir/build/BUILD/cython-0.29.21/TEST_TMP/1/run/cpp/set/set.cpython-310-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", line ?, in set.test_empty_frozenset
Failed example:
    s is frozenset()   # singleton!
Expected:
    True
Got:
    False


======================================================================
FAIL: test_singleton_empty_frozenset (set)
Doctest: set.test_singleton_empty_frozenset
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.10/doctest.py", line 2204, in runTest
    raise self.failureException(self.format_failure(new.getvalue()))
AssertionError: Failed doctest test for set.test_singleton_empty_frozenset
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/cython-0.29.21/TEST_TMP/1/run/cpp/set/set.cpython-310-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", line unknown line number, in test_singleton_empty_frozenset

----------------------------------------------------------------------
File "/builddir/build/BUILD/cython-0.29.21/TEST_TMP/1/run/cpp/set/set.cpython-310-x86_64-linux-gnu.so", line ?, in set.test_singleton_empty_frozenset
Failed example:
    test_singleton_empty_frozenset()  # from CPython's test_set.py
Expected:
    1
Got:
    11
```

These 4 errors are just because the empty frozenset singleton has been removed.
title: [BUG] Tests failing on Python 3.10: annotations as string and no more empty frozenset singleton
